verses.verse: וַ֭יַּעַן <WH6030> Then answered צֹפַ֥ר <WH6691> Zophar הַֽנַּעֲמָתִ֗י <WH5284> the Naamathite וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <WH559> and said

הֲרֹ֣ב <WH7230> Should not the multitude דְּ֭בָרִים <WH1697> of words לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יֵעָנֶ֑ה <WH6030> be answered וְאִם־ <WH518> lo אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> ? and should a man שְׂפָתַ֣יִם <WH8193> full of talk יִצְדָּֽק׃ <WH6663> be justified

בַּ֭דֶּיךָ <WH907> Should thy lies מְתִ֣ים <WH4962> men יַחֲרִ֑ישׁו <WH2790> hold their peace וַ֝תִּלְעַ֗ג <WH3932> ? and when thou mockest וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> and none מַכְלִֽם׃ <WH3637> shall no man make thee ashamed
וַ֭תֹּאמֶר <WH559> For thou hast said זַ֣ךְ <WH2134> [is] pure לִקְחִ֑י <WH3948> My doctrine וּ֝בַ֗ר <WH1249> and I am clean הָיִ֥יתִי <WH1961> am בְעֵינֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5869> in thine eyes

וְֽאוּלָ֗ם <WH199> But מִֽי־ <WH4310> oh יִתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> oh that אֱל֣וֹהַּ <WH433> God דַּבֵּ֑ר <WH1696> would speak וְיִפְתַּ֖ח <WH6605> and open שְׂפָתָ֣יו <WH8193> his lips עִמָּֽךְ׃ <WH5973> against

וְיַגֶּד־ <WH5046> And that he would shew לְךָ֨ ׀ תַּֽעֲלֻמ֣וֹת <WH8587> thee the secrets חָכְמָה֮ <WH2451> of wisdom כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for כִפְלַ֪יִם <WH3718> that [they are] double לְֽת֫וּשִׁיָּ֥ה <WH8454> to that which is וְדַ֡ע <WH3045> Know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יַשֶּׁ֥ה <WH5382> exacteth לְךָ֥ אֱ֝ל֗וֹהַ <WH433> therefore that God מֵעֲוֹנֶֽךָ׃ <WH5771> of thee [less] than thine iniquity

הַחֵ֣קֶר <WH2714> Canst thou by searching אֱל֣וֹהַ <WH433> God תִּמְצָ֑א <WH4672> find out אִ֤ם <WH518> lo עַד־ <WH5704> against תַּכְלִ֖ית <WH8503> the limits שַׁדַּ֣י <WH7706> out the Almighty תִּמְצָֽא׃ <WH4672> discover

גָּבְהֵ֣י <WH1363> [It is] as high שָׁ֭מַיִם <WH8064> as heaven מַה־ <WH4100> what תִּפְעָ֑ל <WH6466> what canst thou do עֲמֻקָּ֥ה <WH6013> ? deeper מִ֝שְּׁא֗וֹל <WH7585> than hell מַה־ <WH4100> what תֵּדָֽע׃ <WH3045> what canst thou know
אֲרֻכָּ֣ה <WH752> thereof [is] longer מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> than the earth מִדָּ֑הּ <WH4055> The measure וּ֝רְחָבָ֗ה <WH7342> and broader מִנִּי־ <WH4480> than יָֽם׃ <WH3220> than the sea
אִם־ <WH518> If יַחֲלֹ֥ף <WH2498> If he cut off וְיַסְגִּ֑יר <WH5462> and shut up וְ֝יַקְהִ֗יל <WH6950> or gather together וּמִ֣י <WH4310> who יְשִׁיבֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH7725> then who can hinder

כִּי־ <WH3588> for ה֭וּא <WH1931> He יָדַ֣ע <WH3045> For he knoweth מְתֵי־ <WH4962> men שָׁ֑וְא <WH7723> vain וַיַּרְא־ <WH7200> he seeth אָ֝֗וֶן <WH205> wickedness וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> without יִתְבּוֹנָֽן׃ <WH995> also will he not then consider
וְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man נָ֭בוּב <WH5014> For vain יִלָּבֵ֑ב <WH3823> would be wise וְעַ֥יִר <WH5895> colt פֶּ֝֗רֶא <WH6501> [like] a wild ass's אָדָ֥ם <WH120> though man יִוָּלֵֽד׃ <WH3205> be born
אִם־ <WH518> If אַ֭תָּ֗ה <WH859> you הֲכִינ֣וֹתָ <WH3559> If thou prepare לִבֶּ֑ךָ <WH3820> thine heart וּפָרַשְׂתָּ֖ <WH6566> and stretch אֵלָ֣יו <WH413> out כַּפֶּֽךָ׃ <WH3709> out thine hands

אִם־ <WH518> If אָ֣וֶן <WH205> If iniquity בְּ֭יָדְךָ <WH3027> [be] in thine hand הַרְחִיקֵ֑הוּ <WH7368> put it far away וְאַל־ <WH408> nay תַּשְׁכֵּ֖ן <WH7931> dwell בְּאֹהָלֶ֣יךָ <WH168> in thy tabernacles עַוְלָֽה׃ <WH5766> and let not wickedness

כִּי־ <WH3588> indeed אָ֤ז ׀ <WH227> Then תִּשָּׂ֣א <WH5375> For then shalt thou lift up פָנֶ֣יךָ <WH6440> thy face מִמּ֑וּם <WH3971> without spot וְהָיִ֥יתָ <WH1961> become מֻ֝צָ֗ק <WH3332> yea thou shalt be stedfast וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and not תִירָֽא׃ <WH3372> and shalt not fear

כִּי־ <WH3588> for אַ֭תָּה <WH859> you עָמָ֣ל <WH5999> [thy] misery תִּשְׁכָּ֑ח <WH7911> Because thou shalt forget כְּמַ֖יִם <WH4325> [it] as waters עָבְר֣וּ <WH5674> [that] pass away תִזְכֹּֽר׃ <WH2142> [and] remember

וּֽ֭מִצָּהֳרַיִם <WH6672> than the noonday יָק֣וּם <WH6965> shall be clearer חָ֑לֶד <WH2465> And [thine] age תָּ֝עֻ֗פָה <WH5774> thou shalt shine forth כַּבֹּ֥קֶר <WH1242> thou shalt be as the morning תִּהְיֶֽה׃ <WH1961> become

וּֽ֭בָטַחְתָּ <WH982> And thou shalt be secure כִּי־ <WH3588> because יֵ֣שׁ <WH3426> because there is תִּקְוָ֑ה <WH8615> hope וְ֝חָפַרְתָּ֗ <WH2658> yea thou shalt dig לָבֶ֥טַח <WH983> in safety תִּשְׁכָּֽב׃ <WH7901> [about thee and] thou shalt take thy rest

וְֽ֭רָבַצְתָּ <WH7257> Also thou shalt lie down וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> and none מַחֲרִ֑יד <WH2729> and none shall make [thee] afraid וְחִלּ֖וּ <WH2470> shall make suit פָנֶ֣יךָ <WH6440> unto thee רַבִּֽים׃ <WH7227> yea many

וְעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> But the eyes רְשָׁעִ֗ים <WH7563> of the wicked תִּ֫כְלֶ֥ינָה <WH3615> shall fail וּ֭מָנוֹס <WH4498> escape אָבַ֣ד <WH6> will be no מִנְהֶ֑ם <WH4480> them וְ֝תִקְוָתָ֗ם <WH8615> and their hope מַֽפַּח־ <WH4646> [shall be as] the giving up נָֽפֶשׁ׃ <WH5315> of the ghost פ
